Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HeLa cell lysates.

Readout description.Result Description: The p.G83D variant showed reduced expression of lamin A protein compared to wild-type.
The p.EAKLQRLdel variant resulted in the absence of lamin A protein expression.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type lamin A cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 100% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of control.

Material used.Description: RNA was extracted from muscle tissue samples.

Readout description.Result Description: The p.G83D variant showed reduced mRNA levels of lamin A compared to wild-type.
The p.EAKLQRLdel variant resulted in undetectable lamin A mRNA levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type lamin A RNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: mRNA levels greater than 100% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: mRNA levels less than 50% of control.
